channel.title: need a save file.
channel.description: hello. my name is jason. i am a small gamer on YouTube. i try to record a variety of games and played through black mesa but didn't complete it. there was a point where i started doing modded minecraft and skyblock and i ended up setting the game aside. since then i have felt the urge to continue where i left off but between the time i paused black mesa and now i got a new gaming pc. and i don't have the save file anymore. so i was wandering if anyone had a save file or a tool i could use to skip to the level i left off at? the last part i recorded was the beginning of the level after burning the giant crab squid thing. sorry not so good with names XD. anyway thanks in advance.

item.title: need a save file.
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Open the console, type “sv_unlockedchapters 99” then you can select whatever chapter you were on from the New Game menu.

Read full topic

item.title: need a save file.
item.dc:creator: Mrabagaming
item.description:
hello. my name is jason. i am a small gamer on YouTube. i try to record a variety of games and played through black mesa but didn’t complete it. there was a point where i started doing modded minecraft and skyblock and i ended up setting the game aside. since then i have felt the urge to continue where i left off but between the time i paused black mesa and now i got a new gaming pc. and i don’t have the save file anymore. so i was wandering if anyone had a save file or a tool i could use to skip to the level i left off at? the last part i recorded was the beginning of the level after burning the giant crab squid thing. sorry not so good with names XD. anyway thanks in advance.

Read full topic
